discaRd 1.1

Required Samples across a CV range

get.weighted.cv.Rd

Estimate number of required samples (trips), using weighted mean, across a range of CV values for discard rates

get.weighted.cv(bydat, dest2)

Arguments

bydat

bycatch data, formatted for Cochran caluclations
dest2

results from get.cochran.ss.by.strat
bydat

bycatch data, formatted for Cochran calculations

Value

a data frame with required samples

See also

get.bydat, cochran_calc_ss

Examples

get.weighted.cv

#> function (bydat, dest2) 
#> {
#>     nmatch = match(bydat$STRATA, dest2$tout$STRATA)
#>     bydat$N = dest2$tout$N[nmatch]
#>     bydat$N[is.na(bydat$N)] = 0
#>     targall = ddply(bydat, c("STRATA"), function(x) cochran_calc_ss(x, 
#>         l_N = x$N[1], l_CVtarg = seq(0, 1, 0.01)))
#>     didx = match(targall$STRATA, dest2$C$STRATA)
#>     targall$D = dest2$C$D[didx]
#>     targall$K = dest2$C$K[didx]
#>     targall$RE_var = dest2$C$RE_var[didx]
#>     w = ddply(targall, c("STRATA"), function(x) sqrt(sum((x$K^2) * 
#>         x$RE_var, na.rm = TRUE)/sum(x$D, na.rm = TRUE)))
#>     wtsamp = ddply(targall, "CV_TARG", function(x) data.frame(REQ_COV_WT = weighted.mean(x$REQ_COV, 
#>         w = x$D, na.rm = T)))
#>     mult = nrow(targall)/nrow(wtsamp)
#>     targall$WT_REQ_COV = rep(wtsamp$REQ_COV_WT, mult)
#>     didx = match(targall$CV_TARG, wtsamp$CV_TARG)
#>     targall$REQ_SAMPLES_WT = wtsamp$REQ_COV_WT * targall$N
#>     samptot = ddply(targall, "CV_TARG", function(x) data.frame(SAMPTOT = sum(x$REQ_SAMPLES_WT, 
#>         na.rm = T)))
#>     totidx = match(targall$CV_TARG, samptot$CV_TARG)
#>     targall$SAMPTOT = samptot$SAMPTOT[totidx]
#>     targall
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x000000003266de18>
#> <environment: namespace:discaRd>
